descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases ATK by **12%**. Casting Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation increases Resonance Liberation DMG by **20%** for 15s. Obtaining Shield allows Resonance Liberation DMG to ignore **7.2%** of the target's DEF for 7s, stacking up to 5 times. This effect is triggered once every 0.5s. Upon casting Intro Skill, this effect reaches max stacks immediately, lasting for 3s.
